P=NP

PNP post: Blender and PyCharm

Integrate blender's package bpy with Pycharm by adding code completion, type-checking, and the rest...

Jan 2, 1970  ·  1 min read

  1. Download python pre-definition generator by mutantbob.

  2. Generate the skeletons: The set of skeletons will be saved in ./pypredef

blender -b -P pypredef_gen.py

  1. Open PyCharm -> Preferences -> Project Interpreter.

  2. Under Project Interpreter drop down menu, click Show All.

  3. Select your desired interpreter and then click Show paths for the selected interpreter.

  4. Click on the plus button + and add the pypredef directory to it.
